entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 02:06 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 02:06 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
